item.title: Riddler Solutions: Palindrome debts and ambiguous absolute value signs
item.description: This post contains solutions to FiveThirtyEightâ€™s two riddles released 2020-02-07, Riddler Express and Riddler Classic. Code for figures and solutions can be found on my github page. Riddler Express The riddle: From James Anderson comes a palindromic puzzle of calendars: This past Sunday was Groundhog Day. Also, there was a football game. But to top it all off, the date, 02/02/2020, was palindromic, meaning it reads the same forwards and backwards (if you ignore the slashes).
